@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@ - * Copyright (c) 2007, 2019, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved. + * Copyright (c) 2007, 2020, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved. @@ -25,1 +25,1 @@ -import java.io.PrintStream; +import jdk.test.lib.Utils; @@ -28,0 +28,2 @@ +import java.io.PrintStream; + @@ -30,1 +32,1 @@ - * + *

@@ -32,9 +34,9 @@ - * - * -stressTime [time] execution time in seconds - * -stressIterationsFactor [factor] iterations factor. - * The actual number of iterations is obtained by multiplying standard - * number of iterations (which is defined by the test itself) and this factor. - * -stressThreadsFactor [factor] number of threads factor - * The actual number of threads is determined by multiplying standard - * number of threads (which is determined by test itself and may also depend - * on machine configuration) and this factor. + *

+ * -stressTime [time] execution time in seconds + * -stressIterationsFactor [factor] iterations factor. + * The actual number of iterations is obtained by multiplying standard + * number of iterations (which is defined by the test itself) and this factor. + * -stressThreadsFactor [factor] number of threads factor + * The actual number of threads is determined by multiplying standard + * number of threads (which is determined by test itself and may also depend + * on machine configuration) and this factor. @@ -46,1 +48,1 @@ - public static enum StressOptionsParam { + public enum StressOptionsParam { @@ -91,1 +93,1 @@ - * @param arg arguments + * @param args arguments @@ -98,12 +100,0 @@ - /** - * Create stresser with same parameters as another. - * - * @param other another instance of StressOptions - */ - public StressOptions(StressOptions other) { - this.time = other.time; - this.iterationsFactor = other.iterationsFactor; - this.threadsFactor = other.threadsFactor; - this.runsFactor = other.runsFactor; - } - @@ -121,1 +111,1 @@ - * + *

@@ -224,1 +214,1 @@ - * Obtain execution time in seconds. + * Obtain execution time in seconds adjusted for TIMEOUT_FACTOR. @@ -229,1 +219,1 @@ - return time; + return Utils.adjustTimeout(time);
